original_text: Then Jesus returned to the yard of the temple. While he was teaching the people there, the leaders of the priests and important Jews went to him. They asked him, ‘What authority do you have to do these things? Tell us. Who gave you the authority to do them?’
korean_text: 예수께서 성전에 들어가 가르치실새 대제사장들과 백성의 장로들이 나아와 이르되 네가 무슨 권위로 이런 일을 하느냐 또 누가 이 권위를 주었느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus returned to the yard of the temple.
While he was teaching the people there,
the leaders of the priests and important Jews went to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장 지도자들과 유대인 중요 인사들이 그에게 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: 'What authority do you have to do these things?'
Who gave you the authority to do them?'
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 당신에게 이것들을 할 권위를 주었습니까?'
